languages.text: "С Джай Хейдари дела обстоят еще хуже — я перехватила вокс-трансляцию, в которой она обещала, цитирую: "прикончить эту кассху, если еще раз увидит".

traits.locale_text: "С Джай Хейдари дела обстоят еще хуже — я перехватила вокс-трансляцию, в которой она обещала, цитирую: "прикончить эту кассху, если еще раз увидит".

languages.text: "Things are even worse with Jae Heydari — I intercepted a vox-cast in which she promised she would, and I quote, 'end that kaskha' if she ever saw her again."
languages.original_text: "С Джай Хейдари дела обстоят еще хуже — я перехватила вокс-трансляцию, в которой она обещала, цитирую: "прикончить эту кассху, если еще раз увидит".

traits.locale_text: "Things are even worse with Jae Heydari — I intercepted the vox transmission in which she promised, quote: "finish this kasskha if I see her again"."
"Things are even worse with Jae Heydari — I intercepted the vox transmission in which she promised, quote: "finish this kasskha if I see her again"."
"Things are even worse with Jae Heydari — I intercepted a vox-cast in which she promised she would, and I quote, 'end that kassha' if she ever saw her again."
"Things are even worse with Jae Heydari — I intercepted a vox-cast in which she promised she would, and I quote, 'end that kassha' if she ever saw her again."
"Things are even worse with Jae Heydari — I intercepted a vox-cast in which she promised she would, and I quote, 'end that kassha' if she ever saw her again."

languages.text: “婕伊·海达利的情况更加糟糕。我截获了一段音阵信息，婕伊赌咒发誓，说如果再见到她的话，就要‘宰了那个小贱人’，这是她的原话。”
languages.original_text: "Things are even worse with Jae Heydari — I intercepted a vox-cast in which she promised she would, and I quote, 'end that kaskha' if she ever saw her again."

traits.locale_text: “婕伊·海达利的情况更加糟糕。我截获了一段音阵信息，婕伊赌咒发誓，说如果再见到她的话，就要‘宰了那个小贱人’，这是她的原话。”
“婕伊·海达利的情况更加糟糕。我截获了一段音阵信息，婕伊赌咒发誓，说如果再见到她的话，就要‘宰了那个小贱人’，这是她的原话。”

languages.text: «Las cosas están aún peor con Jae Heydari: intercepté una transmisión de voco en la que prometió textualmente que "acabaría con esa kaskha" si volvía a cruzarse con ella».
languages.original_text: "Things are even worse with Jae Heydari — I intercepted a vox-cast in which she promised she would, and I quote, 'end that kaskha' if she ever saw her again."

traits.locale_text: «Las cosas están aún peor con Jae Heydari: intercepté una transmisión de voco en la que prometió textualmente que "acabaría con esa kassha" si volvía a cruzarse con ella».

languages.text: "Mit Jae Heydari verhält es sich sogar noch schlimmer ... Ich habe eine Vox-Übertragung abgefangen, in der sie ankündigte, ich zitiere, 'diese Kaskha' zu töten', sollte sie sie jemals wiedersehen."
languages.original_text: "Things are even worse with Jae Heydari — I intercepted a vox-cast in which she promised she would, and I quote, 'end that kaskha' if she ever saw her again."

traits.locale_text: "Mit Jae Heydari verhält es sich sogar noch schlimmer ... Ich habe eine Vox-Übertragung abgefangen, in der sie ankündigte, ich zitiere, 'diese Kassha' zu töten', sollte sie sie jemals wiedersehen."

languages.text: « La situation est encore pire avec Jae Heydari... J'ai intercepté un message-vox dans lequel elle promettait, je cite, de "liquider cette kaskha" si elle venait à la recroiser. »
languages.original_text: "Things are even worse with Jae Heydari — I intercepted a vox-cast in which she promised she would, and I quote, 'end that kaskha' if she ever saw her again."

traits.locale_text: « La situation est encore pire avec Jae Heydari... J'ai intercepté un message-vox dans lequel elle promettait, je cite, de "liquider cette kassha" si elle venait à la recroiser. »

languages.text: 「ジェイ・ヘイダリとの関係はさらに深刻です…ジェイの話していたヴォクス・キャストを傍受たところ、もう一度カシアと顔を合わせたら『あのカスカを終わらせる』と話していました」
languages.original_text: "Things are even worse with Jae Heydari — I intercepted a vox-cast in which she promised she would, and I quote, 'end that kaskha' if she ever saw her again."

traits.locale_text: 「ジェイ・ヘイダリとの関係はさらに深刻です…ジェイの話していたヴォクス・キャストを傍受たところ、もう一度カシアと顔を合わせたら『あのカスカを終わらせる』と話していました」
「ジェイ・ヘイダリとの関係はさらに深刻です…ジェイの話していたヴォクスキャストを傍受たところ、もう一度カシアと顔を合わせたら『あのカッシャを終わらせる』と話していました」

languages.text: "Hele Jae Heydari'yle ilişkileri çok daha vahim. Gönderdiği ve benim de dinlediğim bir voks yayınında Jae Heydari, 'o kaşhayı gördüğü yerde öldüreceğine' yemin ediyordu."
languages.original_text: "Things are even worse with Jae Heydari — I intercepted a vox-cast in which she promised she would, and I quote, 'end that kaskha' if she ever saw her again."
